details.description: This is a widget/function concept embedded into the digital map such as Google Maps. By clicking the weather button, users can activate the weather filter function. People can modify seasons, weather conditions, where it is day or night and the temperature range to filter pictures of places.
details.name: Google Maps Weather Filter Concept

modules.text: Weather Maps is a widget/function concept embedded into Google Maps. By clicking the weather button, users can activate the weather filter function.
modules.text_plain: Weather Maps is a widget/function concept embedded into Google Maps. By clicking the weather button, users can activate the weather filter function.

modules.text: You can modify seasons, weather conditions, where it is day or night and the temperature range to filter pictures of places.
modules.text_plain: You can modify seasons, weather conditions, where it is day or night and the temperature range to filter pictures of places.

modules.text: You also can turn on the temperature button to let the photo display the temperature parameters in a small icon located in the corner of the photo.
modules.text_plain: You also can turn on the temperature button to let the photo display the temperature parameters in a small icon located in the corner of the photo.

modules.text: When people click a specific photo, they also can press the “weather icon” in each picture to see the photos of the place in various weather conditions.
modules.text_plain: When people click a specific photo, they also can press the “weather icon” in each picture to see the photos of the place in various weather conditions.

details.description: Weather is everywhere around us and most time we just wanna basic idea of what is weather now during a glimpse of time. Ambient Weather Pattern gives people a general and quick view of what weather is going on now and in near future. People also can modify the pattern based on their preference.

details.description: Home exploration
details.name: Home Exploration

modules.text:
WHAT IS HOME?
my own bed is
I can be naked, both emotionally and physically.
my wife/husband is
is not a place but a feeling.
a warm dog curled up by my feet at bedtime
I don’t have to be perfect.
there is the smell of my mother’s perfume.
my palm meets my daughter’s palm. 
a good man, a good chair, and a good wine.
...
modules.text_plain: WHAT IS HOME?my own bed isI can be naked, both emotionally and physically.my wife/husband isis not a place but a feeling.a warm dog curled up by my feet at bedtimeI don’t have to be perfect.there is the smell of my mother’s perfume.my palm meets my daughter’s palm. a good man, a good chair, and a good wine....

modules.text: 1.EXPERIMENTAL DESIGN
modules.text_plain: 1.EXPERIMENTAL DESIGN

modules.text: Mental Home is where our "real home" is in our memory which can be our hometown or the place our lover is. Physical home is where we live now. It may be our Mental Home, or just a living place. Can we try to make people feel more "home" within or outside of their physical home?
modules.text_plain: Mental Home is where our "real home" is in our memory which can be our hometown or the place our lover is. Physical home is where we live now. It may be our Mental Home, or just a living place. Can we try to make people feel more "home" within or outside of their physical home?

modules.text:
+Bring home with you - Home Twitter
The device will rotate 360 degree to take photo of home then tweet image and text to twitter. It will tweet some emotional feeling as a human being like “The house is very clean today”, “Ohh! You forgot turn off the stove!” and “Help! Someone broke into the house”
modules.text_plain: +Bring home with you - Home TwitterThe device will rotate 360 degree to take photo of home then tweet image and text to twitter. It will tweet some emotional feeling as a human being like “The house is very clean today”, “Ohh! You forgot turn off the stove!” and “Help! Someone broke into the house”

modules.text:
+Connect with home wherever you are - Home Connection
It is a clock device that can help people far from home to connect their physical home with the mental home. With the 360 degree base, people can see their home in a more real way. Also they can communicate with the home member and feel the warm wind from “home”.
modules.text_plain: +Connect with home wherever you are - Home ConnectionIt is a clock device that can help people far from home to connect their physical home with the mental home. With the 360 degree base, people can see their home in a more real way. Also they can communicate with the home member and feel the warm wind from “home”.

modules.embed: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/87971554?portrait=0" width="600" height="337" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen="" mozallowfullscreen="" allowfullscreen="" style="margin:0px auto;display:block;"></iframe>

modules.text: 2.DISCURSIVE DESIGN
modules.text_plain: 2.DISCURSIVE DESIGN

modules.text: Scientifically, human use prefrontal cortex processes experiences, using sensory input from the eyes, ears, nose and mouth, sorts them into categories, and tags the various memory fragments with specific associations to recall them. So there should be a “space” in our brain that contains our most original “home” feeling.
modules.text_plain: Scientifically, human use prefrontal cortex processes experiences, using sensory input from the eyes, ears, nose and mouth, sorts them into categories, and tags the various memory fragments with specific associations to recall them. So there should be a “space” in our brain that contains our most original “home” feeling.

modules.text:
+Feel the home - Home Box
I created two boxes of two people's “home” feeling. The box contained the image, smell, sound and touch feeling and users can look into and hold the box to feel their inner “home”.
modules.text_plain: +Feel the home - Home BoxI created two boxes of two people's “home” feeling. The box contained the image, smell, sound and touch feeling and users can look into and hold the box to feel their inner “home”.

modules.text:
+The moment of home - Music Teeth Brush
When people use this brush, they can choose the flavor of toothpaste that reminds them most of their home. When people turn the teeth brush on, they will hear the “home-like” sound from the toothbrush. Because people hear the "sound of home" from bone deduction, it will make them feel that the sound is from their inner body. Furthermore, the stick they hold is covered the “home-like” texture. Finally people can close their eyes, imagine the visual image in their memory to recall their “home” from the indicators of the sound, texture, smell and taste.
modules.text_plain: +The moment of home - Music Teeth BrushWhen people use this brush, they can choose the flavor of toothpaste that reminds them most of their home. When people turn the teeth brush on, they will hear the “home-like” sound from the toothbrush. Because people hear the "sound of home" from bone deduction, it will make them feel that the sound is from their inner body. Furthermore, the stick they hold is covered the “home-like” texture. Finally people can close their eyes, imagine the visual image in their memory to recall their “home” from the indicators of the sound, texture, smell and taste.

modules.text: 3.RESPONSIVE DESIGN
modules.text_plain: 3.RESPONSIVE DESIGN

modules.text: There are more and more international students studying in U.S. these days. A big portion of them faced different levels of homesickness and adjustment issues.
modules.text_plain: There are more and more international students studying in U.S. these days. A big portion of them faced different levels of homesickness and adjustment issues.

modules.text:
+Reduce home sick for international students - Second Home
SECOND HOME is a mobile app mainly designed for international students studying in United States to help them alleviate homesickness and adjustment issue in the new environment.
See more detail here.

modules.text: 4.COMMERCIAL DEISGN
modules.text_plain: 4.COMMERCIAL DEISGN

modules.text: Food is the only item that contains five senses and can deliver many home feelings such as intimacy and comfort. Food is also a medium to bring our friends and family together to share our stories and enhance our relationship
modules.text_plain: Food is the only item that contains five senses and can deliver many home feelings such as intimacy and comfort. Food is also a medium to bring our friends and family together to share our stories and enhance our relationship

Chefriends is a service that connects chefs and eaters together creating a new way to enjoy food, learn cooking, and make friends wherever you are.

details.description: Dream^4 is an experiment installation regarding to connecting people by their dreams automatically & manually.
details.name: Dream^4

modules.text: Dream4 is an experimental project which uses people’s dream as a way to match people who may have similar dreams in the real world. The “4“ means that this connection brings no-dimensional dream to our physical 4-dimentional world.

details.description: Faucet concept design
details.name: Faucet Concept Design

modules.text:
Tai-Chi  '太極' is a Chinese cosmological term for the "Supreme Ultimate" state of undifferentiated absolute and infinite potentiality. 
 
TAI-CHI faucet treats hot water as Yang and cold water as Yin, seeming that it blends spirituality in the water and make the process of using water more meaningful. Meanwhile, The gesture of controling the water is similar to Tai-Chi Quan -  a kind of traditional Chinese sports.

details.description: SNAKEE SHOE is an experimental project which people can interact with to customize their own high-heels. People can move the blocks on the layout controler and adjust the handle position in the height controler to change the  properties of the shoes. Then they can export .STL file and 3D printing the real shoes.

details.description: Using a small box, create a space that depicts a given mood/feeling.
details.name: Mood in a Box

modules.text:
Can space capture the essence of a feeling? We utilize adjective like somber, delicate, rational, etc to describe the character of spaces on a day to day basis. It is an intuitive process we engage with.
 
The challenge for this project was to begin with the mood and create a space from there. Given basic achromatic materials and predetermined dimensions to work with I was assigned three adjectives: happy, disorienting, and otherworldly. I chose to work with happy and otherworldly and then utilized light, form and texture to imbue the space with those traits.
modules.text_plain: Can space capture the essence of a feeling? We utilize adjective like somber, delicate, rational, etc to describe the character of spaces on a day to day basis. It is an intuitive process we engage with. The challenge for this project was to begin with the mood and create a space from there. Given basic achromatic materials and predetermined dimensions to work with I was assigned three adjectives: happy, disorienting, and otherworldly. I chose to work with happy and otherworldly and then utilized light, form and texture to imbue the space with those traits.

details.description: To convert an abandoned synagogue into a community center with a focus on food justice.
details.name: Food [community] Center

modules.text: Fall 2012: 5 Week Project
modules.text_plain: Fall 2012: 5 Week Project

modules.text:
Site:  688 Broad St, Providence, RI
Goal:  Convert an abandoned synagogue in South Providence into a gathering center with a focus on food justice issues for the community to unite, strengthen and grow .
modules.text_plain:
Site:  688 Broad St, Providence, RI

Goal:  Convert an abandoned synagogue in South Providence into a gathering center with a focus on food justice issues for the community to unite, strengthen and grow .

modules.text: In an exercise to understand the structure, I created a storyboard pairing that strived to get at the essence of the building.  I found through multiple site visits that the building was all about these barriers/thresholds that one had to step up to in order to reach the main prayer room.  In addition the site had a great sense of memory for what the synagogue once meant to the community.
modules.text_plain: In an exercise to understand the structure, I created a storyboard pairing that strived to get at the essence of the building.  I found through multiple site visits that the building was all about these barriers/thresholds that one had to step up to in order to reach the main prayer room.  In addition the site had a great sense of memory for what the synagogue once meant to the community.

modules.text: Through research I found that the neighborhood is primarily composed of immigrants from a variety of countries.  It is also a poorer community with an average household income of less that $30k.
modules.text_plain: Through research I found that the neighborhood is primarily composed of immigrants from a variety of countries.  It is also a poorer community with an average household income of less that $30k.

modules.text: Based on my research, I concluded that the people in the community didn't have the time or funds for slow food.  It makes sense why fast food is so prevalent within poorer neighborhoods (whole families can be fed with less than $5 and in under 5 minutes).  I studied the history of fast food and its development within society.
modules.text_plain: Based on my research, I concluded that the people in the community didn't have the time or funds for slow food.  It makes sense why fast food is so prevalent within poorer neighborhoods (whole families can be fed with less than $5 and in under 5 minutes).  I studied the history of fast food and its development within society.

modules.text:
Fast food, however, doesn't really provide nutrition and has led to a variety of heath problems.  
For my project, I proposed created a "fast" food temple for the community.  It would maintain the qualities that make fast food appealing BUT it would be better food that would feed the community and the community's economy.
modules.text_plain:
Fast food, however, doesn't really provide nutrition and has led to a variety of heath problems.  
For my project, I proposed created a "fast" food temple for the community.  It would maintain the qualities that make fast food appealing BUT it would be better food that would feed the community and the community's economy.

modules.text: I changed the main entry by cutting through the large processional stairs and creating a vomitorium.
modules.text_plain: I changed the main entry by cutting through the large processional stairs and creating a vomitorium.

modules.text: The relationship of the building within the neighborhood is changed with the addition of a roof garden that replaces th familiar pediment.
modules.text_plain: The relationship of the building within the neighborhood is changed with the addition of a roof garden that replaces th familiar pediment.
